DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether 10-week internet-based program base cognitive behavioral therapy ( CBT ) effective treatment alcohol problem , therapist guidance lead great effect .
DOC.brief_title: Guided Unguided Internet Treatment Problematic Alcohol Use
DOC.detailed_description: Objectives : An 10 week Internet-based self-help program base cognitive behavioral therapy ( CBT ) test among Internet help seekers.The design three-armed randomized control design , outcomes measure term change problematic alcohol use , well depression , anxiety quality life . 80 participant recruit entirely online open access website randomize three different group . All participant access self-help program . However , one group give choice two form therapist guidance ( message weekly chat session ) , one group receive therapist guidance form secure message , one group receive therapist guidance .
DOC.criteria: ≥ 18 year access Internet problematic alcohol use define ≥ 8 p men ≥ 6 p woman Alcohol Use Identification Scale • adequately fluent Swedish
